titleStmt.title: Oates's bug---bug --- boarding-school, at Camberwell. A song. : To the tune of, My Lord Russels farewell. / Writ by J. Dean ...
titleStmt.author: Dean, J. (John), fl. 1679-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Dean, bookseller in Cranborn-street, in Leicester-Fields, near Newport-House.,

notesStmt.note: Item at reel 1792:8 identified as Wing D494C ("no entry" in Wing 2nd ed., 1994).
Reproductions of originals in the Bodleian Library and Harvard University Library.
